channel.title: NightPkz
channel.description:
Introduction About us Section 3 Section 4 The Applying Layout Staff list Credit/Section 7
__________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________________________________________________
1.0 - Introduction First off I will say That I just came up with this idea, We will be making this server from scratch reason being is usually servers get bigger that aren't leeched so unique servers are always good. Apply before it's to late!
__________________________________________________________________________
2.0 - About us So far I have a forum developer with me, We are here to make a big server and have fun doing it :)
__________________________________________________________________________
3.0 - Section 3 Our aim is to have one of the top servers with lots of players and fun!
__________________________________________________________________________
4.0 - Section 4 We will be using dropbox to code over and starting off all funding will come from my pocket donations will go to paying for the server not used for my benefit.
__________________________________________________________________________
5.0 - The Applying Layout
PLEASE USE THIS LAYOUT
Code: [Select] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address? (optional): What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: Skype name: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ __________________________________________________________________________
6.0 - Staff List
(For appliance, I changed the colors.)
Entertainers:
0 (Amount you have)/2 (Amount Wanted)
Coders:
1/3
I am a coder myself Person 2 Person 3
Suggestors: Will be greatly appreciated for coming up with ideas
0/2
Person 1 Person 2
Testers:
0/4
Person 1 Person 2 Person 3 Person 4
__________________________________________________________________________
7.0 - Credits/Section 7
No donations as of yet. _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
You can contact me by skype it will be the best way to get a hold of me. My skype name is dillon.crow

item.title: NightPkz
item.dc:creator: @shadow9903 shadow9903
item.description:
@shadow9903 wrote:

I have not done anything recently I am coming back to rs-ps, So no proof. I am not the best coder but i know my way around.

Read full topic

item.title: NightPkz
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Good luck. Please provide some media though, and proof that you have actually done some work by yourself…

Read full topic

1.0 - Introduction
First off I will say That I just came up with this idea, We will be making this server from scratch reason being is usually servers get bigger that aren’t leeched so unique servers are always good. Apply before it’s to late!

2.0 - About us
So far I have a forum developer with me, We are here to make a big server and have fun doing it

3.0 - Section 3
Our aim is to have one of the top servers with lots of players and fun!

4.0 - Section 4
We will be using dropbox to code over and starting off all funding will come from my pocket donations will go to paying for the server not used for my benefit.

5.0 - The Applying Layout

PLEASE USE THIS LAYOUT

Why do you want to become part of this server?:
